AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] tracked, trapped and killed animals for their meat and leather. \n[PAWN_nameDef] used both ranged and melee weapons. Sometimes, [PAWN_pronoun] hunted alongside animals.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: warrior
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a fearsome warrior, proficient with many weapons. [PAWN_pronoun] participated in many battles.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: archer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] fought for [PAWN_possessive] tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] and specialized in the use of bows, pila, and other ranged weapons.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: brave
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] wielded ikwa, axes, clubs, and other close-ranged weapons in battles for [PAWN_possessive] tribe.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: vengeful hunter
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Following the death of a close friend by animal attack, [PAWN_nameDef] hunted the beast responsible. [PAWN_pronoun] tracked it to a nearby village, only to find one of the villagers wearing its pelt.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: scout
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: Since [PAWN_possessive] tribe made contact with local outlanders, [PAWN_nameDef] contracted [PAWN_possessive] services out as a guide. Frequent contact with ancient technology made [PAWN_objective] comfortable with the lost machines.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: guardian
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: {PAWN_nameDef} and his comrades stand guard at the gates of the web, a portal to a large transport network connecting remote places. Usually {PAWN_nameDef} greets guests or hunts, but sometimes it is required to shoot at what comes out of the gate.
